body:
Setting warmup=1 is equivalent to having 
```
CAFFE_ENFORCE(net->Run());
```
before 
```
net->TEST_Benchmark(
      caffe2::FLAGS_warmup, caffe2::FLAGS_iter, caffe2::FLAGS_run_individual);
```
body_html:
Setting warmup=1 is equivalent to having

CAFFE_ENFORCE(net->Run());

before

net->TEST_Benchmark(
      caffe2::FLAGS_warmup, caffe2::FLAGS_iter, caffe2::FLAGS_run_individual);
